item.title: Supervised Machine Learning (SML)
item.description: This session introduces supervised machine learning (SML) Notebook(s) Introduction to Supervised Machine Learning Recommended Datacamp exercises: Python - Intro to supervised learning Python - Decision Tree modeling Python - SML Preprocessing [Python - SML Feature Engineering](https://app.datacamp.com/learn/courses/preprocessing-for-machine-learning-in-python](https://app.datacamp.com/learn/courses/feature-engineering-for-machine-learning-in-python) Python - SML Model validation Recommended Readings and resources Python Data Science Handbook Chapter 5
